summary: Various patches for Requiem by various authors - Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]More Requiem Patches is a collection of some Requiem patches made by various authors.[/size]



[size=4][u][b]Currently Patched[/b][/u][/size]

The patches provided by hunterrock are made with Requiem 1.8.1 and possibly outdated.
The patches provided by thetrader are ports from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61621/?]Requiem Patch Central[/url] that he doesn't want to support actively.

Hearthfire, Dragonborn, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Patches[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43053/?]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/url] by Hunterrock

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?]Beasts of Tamriel[/url] by xiu12
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12060/?]Bob's Armory[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41466/?]Bonemold Expanded[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51871/?]Coins of Tamriel[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3084445/?]Force70[/url] -  the coine weight slider in Requiems MCM menu will affect only the copper coins now so I would change it to a very low setting, silver coins have a weight of 0.005 and gold 0.01 (requiem default value)
Copper coins worth 1 gold, silver coins worth 25 gold and gold coins worth 100
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72910/?]Dawnguard Arsenal[/url] by supergothmailboxstalker
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57825/?]Dwarven Sorcery Armor[/url]* and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53876/?]Dwarven Gear Sword[/url]* by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13234/?]Elven Weaponry[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19611/?]Expanded Skyrim Weaponry[/url] by hunterrock
Fire and Ice Overhaul (no longer available for download) by thetrader
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3297180/?]Ghosu Compilation Patch[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7587/?]Height Adjusted Races[/url]* by thetrader
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6383/?]Hybrids Vicious Weapon Pack for Skyrim[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39759/?]Immersive Spells and Light[/url] by xackoff
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945/?]Insanity Sorrow Compilation Patch[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1002/?]JaySus Swords[/url]* by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19611/?]Lrsamways[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50740/?]Morrowloot 4E[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10277/?]Omegared99 Armor Compilation[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40491/?]Revenge of the Enemies[/url] by thetrader and hunterrock
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/url] by thetrader, meltyc and azirok
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22691/?]Staves of Skyrim[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58102/?]The Gilded Ebony Set[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20077/?]Tribunal Robes and Masks[/url] by hunterrock
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32405/?]Unique Bows Collection[/url] by hunterrock

*replacer esp. [color=#ff0000]Disable/Delete[/color] the original esp.


[u][b][size=4]Requirements[/size][/b]

[/u]All patches require [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]. Some also require all DLC, Unofficial Patches and their respective parent mods (linked above), unless stated below. All files that require the unofficial patches patch require the following files:
[list]
[*][size=2]All DLC[/size]
[*][size=2]All unofficial patches[/size]
[*][size=2]Weapon and Armor Fixes Redone with no addons [/size]
[*][size=2]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/size]
[*][size=2]The Unofficial Patches and Dragonborn file on this page[/size]
[/list]

[u][b][size=3]Specific Patch Requirements[/size][/b][/u]
[b]Insanity Sorrow Compilation Patch[/b] Requires the textures and meshes from the mods below but you can deactivate the esps. (Requires All)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57999/?]Insanity's Ebony Sword Standalone[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15389/?]Insanitys Celtic Katana[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15545/?]Insanitys Chrysamere[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15955/?]Insanitys Dragon Katana[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19180/?]Insanitys Dragonbane[/url] + Craftable Optional
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35854/?]Insanitys Dwemer Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15439/?]Insanitys Empire Longswords[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15431/?]Insanitys Goldbrand[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18597/?]Insanitys Ice Blade of the Monarch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32930/?]Insanitys Red Eagles Bane[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31002/?]Insanitys Shields[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15422/?]Insanitys Umbra Sword[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26619/?]Insanitys Zatoichi[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36416/?]The Bastard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51417/?]The Stamford[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51544/?]The Thegn[/url]
The unofficial patches and dragonborn file on this page
